title: 'Natural ingredients'
body: 'This new Vivel luxury range soap is lovely to use. All the natural ingredients that are used are so refreshing and full of fragrance. All the soap cleans our skin from dirt and sweat leaves a softer sink. It lathers well and also gets easily rinsed off quickly. The concept of introducing different oil with different natural ingredients is very thoughtful. And the good part is all is curated under single packing. So this pack of six has different combinations under in packing.'

title: 'Effective and nice'
body: 'This is pack of 6 soaps with three variants. The nargis and Kumkumadi oil soap is good for clear skin tone. The nagarmotha and bahumanjari oil makes skin clear and removes impurities. Lastly the chandan and badamam oil smells good and makes skin glowing and soft. This herbal soap pack is better for skin and fits the pocket too.'

title: 'Good soap'
body: 'Very nice soap. It is very effective and skin feels very soft after using it. Also the fragrance is long lasting and nice. There are different types of soap in this pack and it gives a clear even toned and radiant skin after usage. I have been using it everyday and it is very effective. It also acts as a moisturizer and cleanser for the skin. The quality of lather is also very soft and thick. Overall extremely effective and nice.'

title: 'Good product'

title: 'The Vivel VedVidya Luxury Pack of 6 Skincare Soaps lives up to its promises'
body: 'The Vivel VedVidya Luxury Pack of 6 Skincare Soaps is an impressive collection that lives up to its promises. Each soap is thoughtfully formulated to address various skin concerns resulting in noticeable improvements in texture and tone. The gentle yet effective formula cleanses without causing dryness or irritation. The inclusion of skin-loving ingredients demonstrates careful crafting. The elegant packaging adds to its appeal making it an ideal gift choice. Overall this pack offers a luxurious and beneficial skincare experience leaving skin rejuvenated soft and even-toned. Highly recommended for those seeking a holistic approach to skincare.'

title: 'Amazing'
body: 'Enriched with the soothing fragrance of Nargis and the nourishing benefits of Kumkumadi oil this soap gives a fragrant bath along with a feeling of soft and even-toned skin. The floral aroma of Nargis or daffodil flower extract is revitalizing and energizing.i just love all soap..value for money.worth buying product must say.'

title: 'Amazing soap'
body: Amazing Soap,Vivel a well known brand. Benefits Inspired by ingredients used in ancient beauty rituals. These soaps give you the feeling of soft, even-toned, clear, radiant and glowing skin you've always admired. Packaged with love in recyclable material - preserving your beautiful skin and the planet. FormBar soaps  The VedVidya Luxury pack offers 3 different variants of soap bars Experience the luxury of ancient beauty baths with Vivel VedVidya, a range of soaps that are inspired by ingredients used in Ancient Beauty Rituals. These soaps nourish your skin and soothe your senses with their enchanting and long-lasting fragrances Crafted with ingredients which finds its place in ancient Ayurveda literature, VedVidya beauty soaps help you rediscover the feeling of soft, even-toned and healthy-looking and radiant, glowing skin Nargis & Kumkumadi oil bathing bar gives a skin that feels soft and even-toned, Nagarmotha & Bahumanjari oil gives a feeling of soft & clear skin, and Chandan & Badamam oil gives a skin that feels soft and radiant Dermatologically tested and suitable for all skin types including sensitive skin.

title: 'Indulge in Luxury Skincare'
body: 'These Soaps are a comprehensive solution for achieving soft even-toned clear radiant and glowing skin. With this collection it offers a luxurious path to skin wellness. Each soap is formulated to provide specific benefits ensuring a holistic skincare routine. Elevate your skincare journey with this pack for a radiant and revitalized complexion.'

body: 'I loved these soaps.  Why?  There are 6 soaps of 3 different perfumes.  This implies that you could share it among our family members.  Perfume is good and soap is good on skin. They are attractive too. It moisturises well and I feel fresh after taking bath with this. A value for money product.'

title: 'Fantastic'
body: I recently tried Vivel soap, and I must say, it has become an absolute favorite in my skincare routine. The soap's enchanting fragrance instantly uplifts my mood during showers. Its creamy lather gently cleanses my skin, leaving it feeling refreshed and supple. Unlike other soaps, Vivel doesn't strip away moisture; instead, it keeps my skin hydrated and smooth. I have even noticed a reduction in dryness and irritation. With its long-lasting formula, this soap offers great value for money. I wholeheartedly recommend Vivel soap to everyone seeking a rejuvenating and enjoyable bath experience.

title: 'Amazing fragrance'
body: Soap was amazing, these is really useful for summer days , feels so fresh n nice after using these soap came with 3 flavours, there fragrance n texture was nice ,i really liked chandan flavour soap it's my favourite,my whole family liked these product.
